website_summaries.verdict: Featuring military-grade drop protection, this iPhone wallet case is perfect for those seeking ultimate security.
pros: Anti-theft design with hidden card slot
Leather flap folds to double as a kickstand
cons: Not the greatest option for headphone use
Case tends to get scratched when dropped

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after three weeks. Website support doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I love the functionality and the protection. However in just three weeks the metallic surround is pulling away from the TPU case. I think it will fall off entirely in the next few weeks. I registered the product and tried to file a claim; after submitting the form I got a 404 error. So the case is breaking and their website doesn't work. Pretty disappointed. I guess I will try and return through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best case ever! The pocket comfortably holds 2 bank cards, a driver's license and insurance card while blending right in to the back of the case. Very well built and securely holds my iPhone 7 Plus. It also fits nicely on my car mount. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: DCinKC

customer_reviews.title: The warranty is a scam!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I rated as a 5 star but my second case failed and my screen cracked after a 2 foot fall where the phone landed on its corner. The first case failed when the magnets to hold the cover fell out. I purchased the second case when I did not have the amazon order information. Now the second case failed, the screen cracked and I have all the order information. I can “register” my product but there is no was to request a replacement case. Bottom line. The case does hold your cards but the case does not protect your phone and the warranty is a scam!
customer_reviews.author: tnb

customer_reviews.title: awesome storage and functionality
customer_reviews.text: awesome storage and functionality, unfortunately offers very little protection. dropped phone from less than 3 feet when it fell out of my pocket on a tile floor and my screen shattered as bezel hardly extends past glass :(
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Holds cards pretty well and very secure
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this phone case, this case is a bit bigger than his old case. Holds cards pretty well and very secure. Picture shows new case and old case, new case is the case on the left side.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart the first week I had it..like they forgot the glue..
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite case, and I order a new one with every new phone. It is extremely durable and it easily holds three cards and folded up $20 bill. The magnetic cover rolls into a stand which works very well. My phone fell from a shelf 6 feet high, onto a hard tile floor - the back of the cover fell off, but my phone was absolutely fine! Now, because it is such a durable case, it does tend to be rather thick and heavy, which could be an issue if you have a plus sized phone. But I don’t mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Perry

customer_reviews.title: Total case FAIL
customer_reviews.text: My phone shattered in this case. I bought this case for two reasons: to protect my phone when dropped, and credit card holder. i love having my drivers license and credit card at hand. However, yesterday I dropped my phone. The front glass shattered, not just cracked. Total case FAIL 😩. And all Apple stores are closed so I can’t get it fixed. I realized the edging of the case is too small to protect your phone. I recommend you buy a case that will protect your phone. This case fail just cost me a small fortune.
customer_reviews.author: E. Berner

customer_reviews.title: The hidden compartment is everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve previously owned the Otterbox Defender Series for the past 5 years and never had any issues the product; however wanted a case that has a hidden compartment to hold cards. Absolutely love the ease of accessing my license or credit cards on the go. It illuminates having to carry a purse/bag. Dropped my phone several times and my phone is still fully protected. Although there’s not much of a variety of colors, I’d still purchase it again. It provides the protection the phone requires with an added benefit of the hidden compartment. Hopefully they’ll come out with other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Hoaka1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wallet. Just to risky to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice concept and beautiful design with one unfortunate flaw. There is not enough protection for the phones viewing glass. You can mount a glass protector but this raises the viewing area to even with the wallets raised edges. If you drop the wallet on the phone face it will hit on the glass protector certain to cause damage if it hits a hard surface. Other than that I liked the storage area with the magnetic flap. I was able to get 4 cards and some folding money inside. However, I returned it without using it because of the flaw. If the manufacturer would redesign to fix that problem I’d buy it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: what did i like most about this wallet case
customer_reviews.text: what did i like most about this wallet case? EVERYTHING! this is a classic nice looking heavy duty protective phone case surprised? yes! Then, you have room for 3 cards and i have 2 checks in it or of course cash if you choose. Actually i carry two cards and license. It has already came in so handy. I love this. The magnet in it is great. Use it with the car holder. Holds on the refrigerator! I love it 100 % Yes it makes it a little bulkier than you may like but it still easily slips into my back pocket and its a 7 plus iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to look kind of cheap (I don't know why) but I was pleasantly surprised with the quality for the price! Very very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last one lasted TWO YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years! I have livestock and a 4 year old. I’m pretty hard on phones. The only reason I’m replacing it is because the flap on the back is getting harder to open but it doesn’t really really need to be replaced. My phone had a zagg screen protector plus this case and it is just about new condition. I carry 3 cards in the flap and 2 cards (concealed carry permit cards) between the phone and case. No need to tip my hand paying for groceries, right? I 1000% recommend this case. Only drawback ive found is that I need a larger/phablet type phone holder for my car. It’s just a workaround. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: GreytMom

customer_reviews.title: Not military grade :(
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not Military Drop Protection - phone fell from 3 feet high table on a carpet and silver plastic edge from the top cracked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and it's durable
customer_reviews.text: Can fit 3 cards plus a thinker key card to get into my apartment. So far I've only dropped my phone quite a lot, and there are no cracks in the screen. Although I have a screen protector ( I think the type that protects screen from cracks too, which does have some stretches/ would be cracks probably) But the charger fits perfect with the case, and I get a lot of compliments on it, and a few of my friends have also gotten this case for their phone types. It doesn't make the 7 Plus any bigger than it already is, it still fits into pockets and small purses as well as a phone this size can!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Okay product - design warning if you like using earphones a lot, doesn't work easily to plug
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a replacement to the iPhone 6 plus case....first the pros of this case: 1. Great case to store your Drivers license/ credit card (upto 3 cards max). 2. Back flap for viewing position is great. Cons: 1. Biggest con that irked me was the case is not designed to plug in your earphones - did someone even test that basic part? I am unable to snugly plug my earphones or audio cable in car stereo either. I had to use my drill bit to enlarge circularly to snug plug my Bose earphone. 2. Manageable is the bulky feel of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Herman G

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I stopped to write a review because this has been such a good phone case. I just bought my second one. The first lasted well over two years, and probably would have lasted a lot longer if it weren't for the fact that A) I crammed way more cards into it than you're supposed to, and B) I drop my phone daily. Sometimes multiple times in a day. I think that either of these alone would not have been a problem for this sturdy little case, but even so, it still lasted longer than any case I've ever had. It's got a good grip, and works well with the car mounts I've used. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Astabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty  and Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have bought almost every case name brand for my phone. This case by Vena is absolutely my favorite. I’ve had the case for almost one year and unfortunately dropped my phone and it hit the pavement pretty hard. I contacted Vena via-email and requested a new one and explained my situation. I got a response within hours and was advised that a new replacement will be send to me with free shipping. 2-3 days later I got my case and I’m one satisfied customer. Vena’s Warranty and customer service beats the competition!!
customer_reviews.author: El Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I just received so don’t know about durability but love it. Love the rose gold color, love being able to use the back as a stand and love that I can put cards in the back. Has a small place behind the phone to stash a little cash. Much thicker than my old apple neoprene cover but I expected that. Will get used to the thickness, worth it for the storage. Phone popped right in, all buttons, speakers and charge port work great. Very happy. Arrived within 48 hours of order.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can fold the flap to make a stand out of it and that it is metal so you can buy a car mount that is magnetic with this case. It check every box I needed. The entire team at work has this case as we have a card to unlock doors. You just hold the phone up rather than dig the car out. However that also means if you have credit cards inside they can be read. Word to the wise do not keep your credit card in this.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This case is indestructible
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty much indestructible. It’s been on my I phone 8 for over 2 years. It’s been dropped everywhere from bars to Vegas to the beach and rocky river banks . Aside from the decoration coating starting to peel , it doesn’t even have a scratch or chip on it , most important my phone is perfect condition! Yes it’s a little bit heavy and bulky , that takes some getting used to but I’m gonna stick with this brand when this phone bugs out and I have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Priya M

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! Fits perfect, way access to all phone buttons. The back of the case holds crefit cards or ID. I says it holds one card, but I keep 3 cards in it comfortably. The back vard skit has a magnetic flap that covers the cards. The flap also folds into a stand that holds your phone propped up for hands free viewing. There only "down' side is the case is a little thicker than my old case and it does not fit in my Encase holster. I am trying to modify my holster to fit the new case. I love this case and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Convenience?
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but I feel like to complicated. You have to open the back part and take all the cards out to be able to charge with wireless. Even though I haven’t put it on , I still can see that if I use the Apple Pay, I still need to be remove all the cards out to be able to use it, if not, cards will work very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mingli Qin

customer_reviews.title: Super great product to replace wallet
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely well. I was worried about purchasing this. When it comes to your phone and now also your wallet it’s no joke on getting a good product. This is strong and built well. Never have to worry about the magnets coming undone. It always holds closed. I’ve always had cases that also enclose on the front which this one doesn’t. So I was a little worried about that and having to also purchase the clear front protector but it works great as well and gives me a great set up now leaving the wallet at home. It does make my phone heavier but I don’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Derek/Grace

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Useful
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’m loving this case. The wallet part is so cool and functional - I was worried the magnets wouldn’t be strong enough to keep the flap closed, but it’s very sturdy and solid. The only reason I’m leaving 4 stars is because the plastic silver part isn’t as attached to the main/black part of the case as I’d like, and it concerns me that it could shatter upon being dropped. So far, I’ve not tested that out so we’ll just have to wait and see. However, I love the look and usefulness of this case/wallet combo so far and I would recommend it based on its current performance.
customer_reviews.author: Pomales

customer_reviews.title: One of the best wallet case out there with comfortably store 3 cards
customer_reviews.text: One of the best wallet case out there with comfortably store 3 cards. The design is unique that is completely shields the cards which I like. Also it is easy to get the cards in and out until you know that you have to open the back cover all the way (I had tried only 3/4th and was wondering how to get the cards out). The added functionality for magnetic car mount is great. Only negative side is that it is very bulky. Given it supports this many cards (up to 3) you got to compromise one way or another. I guess the design wins over the bulky nature of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Somu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I was looking for an otter box wallet case since that’s what I always get, but they didn’t have one for the iPhone 8plus yet. I found this one, and to be honest, didn’t have high hopes for it. However, I put it on, and I like it more than the otter box! It doesn’t make the phone too big and I can store 4 cards. I rarely use the stand, but I know it’s there if I need it. Definitely worth it, and the price is so reasonable! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my iPhone 7 plus
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product, Perfect for my iPhone 7 plus This case well build, strong back cover magnet and fits 3 credit cards. Raised lip with tempered glass installed, see pictures able to access to all ports with no problems.... In my opinion this case a bit heavy....hopefully work well with CD magnetic holder when arrived. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Eddie91316

customer_reviews.title: Solid and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! The flap has sufficiently strong magnets, they’ll even clamp down on a card that is halfway out of the case. So far I’ve been able to get 3 cards (2 credit/debit cards and my drivers license) with 0 issue. I might be able to get a medical card or something but it would be tight. Opening and setting the flap to make a stand is simple and intuitive. The flap has velvety material on the inside so it stays put really well. So far no compass issues, my cards work, Apple Pay works, nice amount of lip on the screen. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am now able to ditch my wallet and have all I need in with me in this case. I store 4 cards without issue. One credit card with non-raised numbers, one with raised numbers, my DL and my thin health insurance card. It feels very secure, it’s convenient to get cards in and out. Many of the reviews say the built in folding stand does not work well but I have had no problems. It works great for me. Maybe if your off roading in a Jeep trying to watch something with the stand deployed, it may give but for normal table top/airplane use. No problem. Pleasantly surprised by this product and completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Salupo

customer_reviews.title: No more cracked iPhones!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Case always on phone. I had a small crack in the top corner. Took the case off for a cleaning and the back of my Iphone 8 has a crack from top to bottom. VEXED!. 2 cards & one ID fits ok. Sometimes hard to pull out but I’m used to that with all cardholders. Holding up pretty well & doing the job. A few scuffs on the bottom from falling but not bad. When driving I don’t have to remove it to place it in my phone travel holder. That makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Swipeaholic

customer_reviews.title: wireless charging blocked
customer_reviews.text: the things I like about it is the grip in my hand, sturdy in my back pocket, does not slip out as much, the magnetic fold out stand up phone and watch movie's. the side buttons work real easy I like the look the things I don't like about it is when you wireless charge your phone you have to open up or fold out the magnetic stand up all the way and set it back down on the charger to work the charger, I assume you will need to remove your cards with the magnetic strips so the charger won't scrabbled it.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my wife and it works great. I've seen her drop her phone 4 times ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and it works great. I've seen her drop her phone 4 times and the only damage is a small chip to the tempered glass screen protector that cost twice as much as this case. You can see why a good case is important to me. We also have a scosche magnetic mount on the car and this attaches great to that. We didn't have to stick any additional magnets on the case. The card holder and kickstand are handy. Overall this case is very well built with quality materials and looks like it will last for good length of time. I've already recommended this case to two other people.
customer_reviews.author: MixTape Market

customer_reviews.title: Best storage phone case on the market
customer_reviews.text: I really am impressed with this case. Easily holds 3 cards. Buttons and charge port easliy accessible. The only thing that I can say I don’t like is that the side of the phone where the flap opens has a slight increased edge and not as smooth compared to the other side. However if you want storage in your case then you may have to forfeit on smooth edges which I was willing to overlook. Seems durable and with the extra feature of a stand that my previous case did not have I am thoroughly impressed and satisfied. Also with PRIME my order was processed and delivered in less than 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: erin lange

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: It looks as pictured, I just wish the rubber sides curved out more to protect the front of the phone. I feel if it fell the front would be shattered. It’s lighter than my other case I liked, it was heavier, had s front snap cover but the color was always fading. Is this worth $27? I don’t think so since I feel my phone screen is vulnerable, but this is better than some others I’ve seen. Hopefully it will last
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: love this case
customer_reviews.text: Put on this case and a screen protector and voila! You have a safe phone. It's very convenient to have space for a few cards attached to your phone; I love it for when I'm going to an event and don't want to have to look after my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I was an Otterbox person, but they didn't make a wallet case that fit my new phone. I tried this case and fell in love immediately. I'm not easy on my phone, and this case has been great. If you stuff more than 3 cards into the area, it bends the case a little which could be why some have experienced the back of the case splitting off. After about a year of dropping it often and overstuffing the card area (3 cards, license, health insurance card) , it did start to come apart, but I didn't think that was a bad lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gaudino

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 teenagers that refuse to carry a purse. They both need their ID and debit cards with them at all times. Ya know .. can we go with ?? Can I have 20 bucks?? I’ll put it on your card. Oh we don’t have our card. BUT THEY ALWAYS HAVE THEIR PHONES!! Now they hate that’s it’s a bit thicker then not having a case. But I don’t care!!! This case is perfect for 2 cards and a few bucks !!! Need a screen protector!!! But this case is BAD A$$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome but I am sad. I have the drops (a lot) and it has been sturdy ever sense. But I dropped it today and the shell on the back came off. I have put this thing through the ringer and it has held together for me. Needless to say. This product is an A+. I would recommend it to everyone who isn’t a butterfingers. Most likely if you are careful with your phone it could last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could want! Holds a few cards or your ID safely in place with no fear of them falling out. Easy access card storage and it’s cool that the back flap can fold over to be a stand! I also love that it’s a magnet so I can just pop it onto my phone holder in my car. Only wish there were more color options. Other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. i can put 3 cards, my DL and 4 folded 5 dollar bills in the back without any issue. flap closes flat. i fold the bills in half than insert the top card in between and fold again sliding it into the back. it gets tricky sometimes trying to get the card out but if you know what cards you use the most-keep those on top. I haven't dropped it yet so don't know how it holds up. For wireless charging-take the phone out.It will not charge while in the case. Attaches to any vent mount magnet easily and depending on the strength of the magnet it holds it in place really firmly.
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY KHAN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, holds 4 cards easily
customer_reviews.text: Great way to carry cards without needing a wallet. I use this with four cards (debit, credit, drivers license, costco membership). The magnetic back cover seals up well, and even after months and months of use shows no signs of wear or weakening. The case itself protects very well (dropped my iPhone 7 plus on the pavement a few times, no damage to the phone OR the case). Overall a very well made product. You MIGHT be able to fit a fifth card in the storage area, but I haven't tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: No wallet needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I carry a few credit cards and my phone, I was tired of fumbling wallet, keys, phone always felt like I was going to forget something. This case is a life saver. It definitely makes my phone heavier, and I was still able to place my pop-socket on the magnetic back and it still fits in my back jean pocket. I have in the credit card flap, DL, CC. Costco card, insurance card and my benny card. Easy access to cards in and out. Wish I would have found this case a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: JenD.

customer_reviews.title: Great case - a bit heavy but I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy but it carries my license and two credit cards. I have a folded $20 in between the phone and case too. I have dropped my phone a few times and has protected my phone from scratches and cracks. I use it as a stand everyday and I like that you can change the angle easily. The magnet is strong but hasn't affected my credit cards at all. I also purchased the magnetic mount from the same company and like that I can put it on and take it off easily. I ordered a iPhone X and I am will be getting the same case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product,Elegant case for an iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: I have not received my iphone 7 yet, but it looks nice and elegant. I liked the compartment in the back, it fits an id and 2 credit cards or money. The flap in the back is very nice built. No too happy with this delivery it was mis handle the box that the casing came on was crashed but the casing was not damaged . This is the 3rd case that I order for friends as gift and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Magnet was coming out of the seem as soon as I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t had to use my wallet in 6 months! Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: Get so many compliments on this. I really researched covers for my phone and landed on this one. It holds license, 3 cards and one bill. Magnetic cover works as a stand. Cover works with magnetic car mount. No need to attach metal plate that comes with mount. Works best with “GRYP” mount. Wireless charging but you have to open the cover. Can use magnetic cover to stick phone to metal surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Magnets pop out of back
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the case is magnetic and attached to car vent magnet holders. However the first one bought July 2019 only lasted 6 month before pieces of magnet began to show This 2nd one only lasted 2 months before falling apart where magnet are under edge of fabric. Waste of money 2 times. I emailed manufacturer and they never even answered. I sent pix also
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Lambis

customer_reviews.title: Every feature desired
customer_reviews.text: My college aged son’s Xmas list included a request for a new iPhone 8 Plus case which included a a kickstand & the ability to hold his a Debit card & some cash. This was one of the few cases that fit the bill. My son loves it-however he does say that it is a little heavy to hold with one hand. All in all-sturdy, functional & would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: StellaMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I just liked it a lot. Some people said it is think but after using it for awhile now, I liked it. The purpose is for me to be able to put my credit card with my phone. Nowadays, no one leaves home without their cellphone so it has just make it easier for me to have a way of paying for something I like when I go out. the plus side of it is that I can flip the back to have the phone stand so I can watch movies on my iphone. I used to have another kind of case that can "stand" but it is not like this one. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: JesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 Fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Every time I upgrade my phone I reorder this case.Several of my coworkers have also purchased it after I showed them mine (Apple and Samsung users). I love the stand feature and I can fit four credit cards along with my ID. Recently because of the "no hands" law in GA it works great with the magnetic car mount without any additional attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your phone, worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Makes your phone pretty heavy, but well worth it for the protection you get with it. I’ve stored up to 4 cards and money where the cards go and random receipts or club cards in the flap part. I’ve dropped my phone at least 2 times since getting the case and my phone is perfectly fine. One down side is that it’s hard to get it to stay on a phone car holder. The magnet will stick to the flap, but the flap will open up sometime and the phone is heavier because of the case. Other then that it’s awesome. If something ever happens to this one, I’ll just get another one of the exact kind.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: ... this case for 2 weeks now and I absolutely love it. I have an iPhone 7+ I currently ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for 2 weeks now and I absolutely love it. I have an iPhone 7+ I currently have 2 credit cards, drivers license and 2 insurance cards inside. The insurance cards and drivers license combined have the thickness of about 1.5 credit cards. I could still add an additional credit card or a couple of business cards without issue. I’ve also dropped it once from about 4’ onto concrete and all is still intact. This is by far the best multifunctional case I’ve ever had. I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaegers

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with wireless chargers
customer_reviews.text: I like the case but it doesn’t charge in the wireless charger. Instructions say to simply open the back card cover... nope! Can’t keep the case if it doesn’t work with the charger.
customer_reviews.author: 8ulldogmama

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! It's still going strong and has barely ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for about 5 months now, and I love it! It's still going strong and has barely shown any signs of wear. It is large, but I have used much bulkier card cases before. I like to keep my license and main debit card in the case. I can fit another card but I find it a little snug. The kickstand is also perfect if you like to watch a lot of youtube/netflix like I do. The magnet works really well, I've never had a problem with my case opening or losing a card.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee Paki

customer_reviews.title: I like the case
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday. The case looks to be high quality. The "kickstand" has different angle positions that you could use. I like the case. The only thing I don't like is that it's a little heavy and bulky. The bulk doesn't bother me as much because it's to be expected with card cases. I will use this for a while to see if I can get over the heaviness.
customer_reviews.author: Ktsherman72

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only thing I don’t like is the edges aren’t raised enough. So if you face the phone face down the screen touches. Other than that I love it. Super durable. Holds 4 cards. Then don’t fall out when I drop my phone. Out of all my wallet cases I’ve had this is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Easley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I drop my phone all the time and the phone is still good. I did put a screen protector on because I drop my phone all the time. I did get the outside sliver part to fall off, but I snapped it right back on it hasn’t fallen off again. I put 3-4 cards and like 2-3 bills on the back and it fine never falls out. If they come out with a purple color I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Went around and around checking out cases until I finally pulled the trigger. 6 months later and the closure still shuts tight and holds cards as it should. I'm able to get two comfortably in the case then place two other between the phone and the case. No need to carry a wallet anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CJT

customer_reviews.title: I really like this case.
customer_reviews.text: - fast shipping through prime member. - very well protect my phone from falling, but not the front of the phone. - magnet really works for my car holder. - It does not look cute, but it does good work. - it's very good quality, I had my phone for 5 years, I have changed this case only 1 time.
customer_reviews.author: Ping li

customer_reviews.title: Good case in theory but no service after the sale from the advertised warranty
customer_reviews.text: The style and theory behind this case is spot on but unfortunately the durability is lacking. They advertise a warranty but there is no way to file an online claim on their website--after they put you through capturing your information there is no guidance on filing a claim. If you treat phone cases as disposables and don't expect service after the sale then this is a good case. Being able to readily access cards and not have to carry wallet or purse is great! I never felt like cards were insecure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Business Cards Don't Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am going to have to return this because a standard size business card will not fit in the rear pocket. I realize the photo in the ad shows credit cards, but I have bought similar items in the past and business cards always fit because standard business cards are only a fraction longer. The product actually looks pretty good and is durable (although a bit heavy) so I'm disappointed that I'll have to find something else. BTW, the phone stand only works in "landscape" orientation, not portrait. That's not a deal killer for me, but I thought others might want to know that.
customer_reviews.author: NetPlay525

customer_reviews.title: My first Vena case that failed after 6mos.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always ordered Vena cases for my phones and they’ve always outlived the phone until this IPhone 8Plus. Around 6mos the magnets started coming loose and now I have to figure a way to glue them back in. It’s like the flap has a stronger magnetic attraction than the sides of the bottom credit card area that pull the little magnets right out.
customer_reviews.author: Doris C.

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet phone case
customer_reviews.text: This case was perfect for my needs. I need a wallet case that will hold at least 2 cards. I carry 2 cards (license and credit card) and a few bills. Most wallet cases can't do this. Plus, the case is very sturdy. I dropped it many times with no issues. 3 of our 5 phones have this case. This is the first thing I buy when I get a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: 1Ch410Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over 2 months, what a waste!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for the second time February 25th 2019. Today is May 5th 2019. I dropped it yesterday and it broke. This is my second one of these cases and the first one lasted over a year. Apparently the quality has gone down hill. Very disappointed. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great option instead of wallet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 17 year old son! He went about a year before losing his wallet so we decided since his phone is glued to him, the best thing for his drivers license and debit card was to be attached to his phone somehow. He picked it out and it’s perfect. A little bulky, but that wasn’t a concern for him!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Quality Case & Great Features
customer_reviews.text: My nephew has this case and raved about it so I bought the iPhone 8+ case. It is high quality and has a secure space on the back for 3-4 cards (cc or business cards). The back flap does not show but stays securely in place so no one knows there are cards there. The magnetic back flap also doubles as a stand for the phone to elevate the screen for viewing. The case does make the phone a tad heavier but not very much. I got the black with stainless steel case and it is well-made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...a little big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she really liked it at first. It’s made well and works exactly as you would expect. Lately though she has stopped using it. She feels it’s bigger than she wants. Nothing against the quality or the product, just the ever changing mind of a teenage girl
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: A better credit card case option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Spigen back sliding credit card case which seemed to always have the back fall off. This case holds a credit card, my bank card, and my Drivers license very snugly. Overall, the case seems like it will be sturdy and offer good protection. No issue accessing any of the buttons or ports on my iPhone 7 plus
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schumack

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why picture quality is one of the questions. Love this product though. Can fit up to four cards in it. Love not having to have a wallet also. Only complaint is that it’s a little bulky but so are most phone covers that protect the phone. I bought one of these for my Galaxy S7 and my wife liked it so I got one for her iPhone. Now I have an iPhone 8+ and got one for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kingstonbeat

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 23-year old son who would either forgot his wallet but had his phone, or had his wallet but not his phone. PROBLEM SOLVED! I saw this item on one of those "what to buy a young man for Christmas" lists. So glad I did. I'm going to get one for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for an iPhone case + wallet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a wallet-style case for my phone, but I also wanted to be able to use my phone as a phone, and to be able to take pictures easily, etc. This fits the bill very nicely. The card slot in the back is secured really well with the magnetic cover. The case does add bulk to the iPhone, but not unpleasantly so. The case materials have a nice look and feel to them; nothing shabby or shoddy about them. Finally, the way the wallet cover folds into a little stand is ingenious, and just makes this perfect wallet + case combination.
customer_reviews.author: K. Borchers

customer_reviews.title: Nice, convenient, but be wary of drop protection
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this on her iPhone 7s. This is her second case and she finds the holder for a few cards and cash convenient. The magnetic back cover is perfect for the holder in her car. The problem, don’t count on too much drop protection. Waist high drop to garage floor and corner of screen shattered. Not a direct hit to glass since there is a mark where it landed on the plastic surround of the case. 3 Star because it is a good case, just not great at drop protection.
customer_reviews.author: akomin

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and qulity
customer_reviews.text: Nice solidly built case of quality materials. Superb design. It does feel heavy and while I have not weighed it to me it feels like it about doubles the phone weight. Credit cards fit well as do business cards. I typically carry my drivers license, one credit card, one business card and one single bill for emergency cash. I have a feeling I will need to drop carrying th emergency cash because I believe it would be too easy to pull it out inadvertently as I am pulling my cc out. Perhaps as I get a little more comfortable getting my card in and out I will change my opinion on that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 3 Card case
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. I have bought and tried a few wallet style iPhone 7plus cases in the past as the phone is so big I don’t want to carry a wallet too. This case can easily hold three cards plus some cash. Cards a very secure and magnetic back closure works great for those magnetic mounts in your car (very secure). Hope it lasts long as some of my other cases had durability issues. But so far so good it’s by far my favorite 3 Card case
customer_reviews.author: WAC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but had some defects. Got a refund
customer_reviews.text: I liked all of the features of this case, but it started to fall apart less than a month after I bought it. I got a full refund and bought a different type of case this time. Too bad, it was nice to have my DL and insurance card handy while driving. I had the same case for my iPhone SE and used it over a year with no trouble. Might have just been a dud, but I didn't want to chance another one. The magnet is strong and it stuck to the holder in my car with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Case has held up well so far (a few months of constant use) - magnetic cover stays closed when transitioning in/out of front pocket. The articulated cover doesn’t work particularly well for propping up the phone but not a big deal for me. Conceals 2-3 cards or 1-2 cards and a few thinly folded bills. Case works great with my magnetic car mount as well. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gary t.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect card case
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case. it has everything you want in a phone case. secure fit, cushioned corners, multi-angle stand, card holder and a secure magnetic cover for the cards. The buttons are easily accessible too. My 8+ fits perfectly although it fit my old iPhone 6+ quite well too. The only disadvantage is the weight - along with the phone and cards, it's a little weighty. If you want something thin and light, go somewhere else. if you want to know your phone is protected, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Giles

customer_reviews.title: ... a while through Amazon for a wallet case I liked. this fit very well with what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a while through Amazon for a wallet case I liked. this fit very well with what I wanted. Very well constructed, I was able it fit two debit cards, my DL, and a wholesale ID into the case. The flap I was most concerned with; however. the construction is very good as well. The only thing I see as a potential issue is the flat and the edge you use to open and close the case. It is glued together and thin. I would suggest to the manufacturer to add some good stitching to reinforce the edge. Over all I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I keep my license and card in it, so it is good for when I am on the run and don’t want to carry too much with me except the essentials. The downside is that it does not have the holes to attach a wrist strap to it. It would make quick, mini grocery shopping trips convenient if I don’t have pockets, but nope. Gotta hold the phone on one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this case for 2 years now!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for two years! I have dropped my phone many times and it hasn’t broken. I don’t have a screen cover on it either. Super convenient I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this case. We have one for my iPhone 8 and my husbands 8 plus. It’s magnetic so it’s easy to mount. It looks great, the back flap is great quality and opens and closes easily but it is very secure. It is a little heavy and the slot does start to scrape up credit cards, but that will happen with any hard case.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and makes me feel like my phone is well protected. The added feature of having your cards in there is a necessity because I am tired of carrying my wallet around along with my phone. Awesome for when you go to bars because you want to carry as little as possible depending on how much you want to drink. This case with a good screen protector is a must!
customer_reviews.author: AlejandroMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Best case I have had
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best cases I have had and well worth the money! I have room for 3 cards and it has a cover the folds to hold the phone on my desk. I have dropped it with no problem! I have carrying a purse and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Holly C

customer_reviews.title: Magnets falling out
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product in the past and loved them but the new one I got the magnets are falling out. Disappointed in newer product and they unwilling to send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Really functional and slick. Integrates well with phone and holds two cards and a bill or two (but no more than that). Back part started separating ever so slightly from the front part of the case after about two months of daily use, which is disappointing, but it's an inexpensive case and the separation is barely noticeable. Certainly doesn't get in the way of using the phone. Overall, a great case for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PHONE CASE!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I had a Speck case before with cards but it was a bit hard to get the cards out and it wore off the front cards. This one is much better. Magnet snaps shut to hold cards and I like that it isn't supper obvious that you even have the cards in the back of your phone. Dropped my 8 plus on concrete and no damage. Makes phone a little thicker, but slides easily in my back jeans pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marple

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an awesome and convenient case. The only thing I don't really prefer is the style and coloring... Other than that, it is great. It can hold 3 cards easily in the back while also securing them. People always seem to be amazed when I open this case and the cards are revealed. You'd never guess! On top of all of this, this case holds up really well. I've had it for about a year and it has yet to have any tears or chips.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Unusable due to magnets falling out 8 months in
customer_reviews.text: I've used this case daily and LOVED it for the first eight months. Recently the case recently started coming apart at the edges. The tiny magnets now fall out regularly and and stuck to each other, making them difficult to replace. The problem has made the case unusable since the cover no longer stays shut. My biggest issue with this is how preventable the problem seems. Stronger glue or slightly altered design would seem to do the trick. Please improve the design on this otherwise excellent case.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gardner

customer_reviews.title: All In One!
customer_reviews.text: This case had everything I was looking for - card holder (fit 3 cards comfortably), magnetic back (for driving) and stand for watching videos. Also huge pro is that apple pay still works with this cover. The one con - its heavy! I started to feel it in my wrist after holding it up for a while so watch out if you have sensitive/weak wrists.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyCake

customer_reviews.title: Great case, exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I love it that the case will easily hold my drivers license and two credit cards. It feels good in my hand, and the kick stand is great for watching shows, UTube or Movies. I would definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Pitch

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few years back and it lasted me this whole time with many drops... Finally broke so I order a new one, which promptly broke.
customer_reviews.author: Em S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: Overall the case is well built. The magnets that hold the card slip seem sturdy, and the case itself actually dosnt look have bad. The case does make the phone a little bulky, but this was expected and it's not so bad that I can't live with it. The only reason I removed a star was because the sliver part seems to wiggle a little when pushed. The case seems sturdyvenouph, and for 17 bucks it's fine. But you can tell the silver part is a separate piece of the case and was affixed to the black part that holds the phone in.
customer_reviews.author: cybergeek

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, purchased for others in family!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality and features! I can fit my driver's license, credit card and one folded bill. I'm still able to place on standing charger (with the back flap open and credit cards inside). I use the magnetic back flap often as a stand while watching videos. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Donner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased countless cell phone cases and pop sockets. I just wanted a case that I could use as a stand, would hold my ID and bank card and was durable (didn’t feel slippery and cheap). This case exceeds my expectations and I haven’t bought another case since this one. I love this case. I’d give it ten stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet alternative phone case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I love it. The vinyl tore when dropped on concrete but the case still works fine. I see this as the best choice for a phone case, with a card and cash compartment. This is better than a similar case I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Walker

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this new phone case at the end of May and it is already broken. The magnets for the flap on the back are not strong enough and/or glued down properly so the magnets move around and the flap does not stay shut. I shouldn't have to glue down parts of the case after just 2 months. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: loholle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Consumer
customer_reviews.text: I am utterly disappointed with this product considering it is advertised as “military grade drop protection”. I have only used the case for 17 days and it only took 3 shallow phone drops for the breakage to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Santos

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little on the heavy side but I love that I can easily put 3 cards in and ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is a little on the heavy side but I love that I can easily put 3 cards in and very easily remove them. The magnetic closure/stand is a definite plus! *** update*** the first case I bought lasted 2 years. I purchased the same exact replacement and it lasted less than a month before it completely fell apart. The quality of this case has definitely changed. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of phone wallets. Had one I liked that didn’t close over the front of my phone but snapped close to the back of the phone. That case finally broke and was no longer sold so I ordered a different brand and it was no good ☹️ So on the search I went. I decided to give this a try because it was suggested in the comments of my old case. I love this case ! It hold my five cards and is a LOT slimmer then my other case. I highly recommend. I’m getting another for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

product_meta.title: VENA Wallet Case Compatible with iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 7 Plus, vCommute (Military Grade Drop Protection) Flip Leather Cover Card Slot with Kickstand Compatible w/iPhone 8 Plus and 7 Plus (Gray/Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Space Gray / BlackPatented iPhone 7 Plus / iPhone 8 Plus Wallet Case
With Vena's patented vCommute wallet, you can conveniently store your ID, credit/debit cards, business cards, or transit cards in the hidden card slot on the back of the case. Better yet, vCommute even works with Apple Pay. 

Multi-Angle Magnetic-Lock Stand 
This unique and versatile iPhone 7 Plus / iPhone 8 Plus case features a leather cover that folds up in three different positions, giving you the convenience to watch videos and movies at your desired angle. 

Military Grade Drop Protection 
Made from high-quality polycarbonate (PC) and shock-absorbing thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) built with CornerGuardTM technology, this iPhone 7 Plus / iPhone 8 Plus protective case has been drop tested to meet MIL-STD 810G-516.6, surviving 26 drops from 4 feet high. The TPU layer on the inside of the case does not stretch out over time and ensures your cards remain scratch-free. 

Precise Craftsmanship, Detailed Design 
The vCommute case is designed with precision cut-outs and provides effortless access to all ports, buttons, and features of your phone. The power and volume buttons are crafted to maintain the same great tactile feedback as your phone's buttons. 

Magnetic Car Mount Friendly 
The magnetic leather flap is compatible with magnetic car mounts – no additional plate or adhesive needed. 

Satisfaction Guaranteed
A limited lifetime warranty is included with your Vena product. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply reach out to us and we will replace or refund your purchase. Visit our website for more details.

Note: 
1. The cardholder can store up to 2 cards (subject to the thickness of your cards). 
2. Wireless charging compatible for iPhone 8 Plus (with the flap open).
3. Metal credit cards will interfere with wireless charging. Please remove before charging.

Compatibility:
•Apple iPhone 7 Plus (5.5"")
•Apple iPhone 8 Plus
feature_bullets: [PATENTED DESIGN IPHONE 7 PLUS WALLET CASE, IPHONE 8 PLUS WALLET CASE] vCommute combines functionality and protection. The hidden card slot securely stores IDs, credit or debit cards, or even transit cards; plus it does not interfere with Apple Pay.

[MILITARY GRADE DROP PROTECTION WITH CORNERGUARD TECHNOLOGY] Dual-layer polycarbonate and TPU design meets military drop-test standard (MIL STD 810G-516.6), surviving 26 drops from 4 feet high. CornerGuard technology ensures that all four corners of the case are designed to absorb and disperse force from drops.

[COMPATIBLE WITH WIRELESS CHARGING] Open the card flap and place flat on Qi charger, and your phone will begin to charge. Note: Metal cards may interfere with wireless charging. Remove before placing on charger.
[MULTI-ANGLE MAGNETIC LOCK STAND] The foldable leather flap on the back of the case doubles as a kickstand so you can watch videos at your desired angle.
[COMPATIBLE WITH MAGNETIC CAR MOUNT] This iPhone 7 Plus wallet case, iPhone 8 Plus wallet case comes with metal plates incorporated in the flap, therefore no additional plate or adhesive is needed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,635 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Up to 2 Card Slot Holder, CornerGuard Drop Proof, kickStand, Works with Magnetic Car Mount
specifications.Included Components: 1 x Vena vCommute Wallet Case for Apple iPhone 7 Plus
